_description: The message of the song of the nightingale — two short couplets

NLWPen356.Transcription:
þe nyȝtyngale syngesþat all þe wod ryngsScho
                    singyth in hire songþat þe nyȝt is to long
NLWPen356.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47: 46.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 567.
